thread.title: Detroit Lions Levy, Pettigrew to miss Sunday's Vikings game
thread.title_full: Detroit Lions Levy, Pettigrew to miss Sunday's Vikings game

title: Detroit Lions Levy, Pettigrew to miss Sunday's Vikings game
text:
Lions list Levy, Pettigrew as out for Sunday's Vikings game; Wilson questionable THE ASSOCIATED PRESS First Posted: October 23, 2015 - 5:40 pmLast Updated: October 23, 2015 - 5:41 pm We also have more stories about: (click the phrases to see a list) 
People: 
Michigan (860) 

ALLEN PARK, Michigan â€” Linebacker DeAndre Levy and tight end Brandon Pettigrew will miss Detroit's game against Minnesota at Ford Field. 
The Lions also say Friday that cornerback Josh Wilson is questionable Sunday. 
Both the Vikings (3-2) and Detroit (1-5) are trying to win a second straight game. 
Levy has a hip injury. Pettigrew has injuries to a knee and elbow. Neither practiced Wednesday through Friday. Wilson's injury is listed as a concussion. He had a limited practice Friday. 
Detroit also says the team has released defensive tackle Ishmaa'ily Kitchen.
